title: Strings
concept: This level teaches Java string manipulation: length, charAt, counting vowels & consonants, reversing, palindrome checking, substring search, frequency and splitting words.

challenges.title: String Length
challenges.description: Read a string and print its length.

challenges.title: Count Vowels
challenges.description: Count number of vowels (a,e,i,o,u in both cases) and print the count.

challenges.title: Count Consonants
challenges.description: Count consonants (alphabet but not vowels) and print number. Ignore digits and symbols.

challenges.title: Reverse String
challenges.description: Print the reverse of the string.

challenges.title: Palindrome Check
challenges.description: Check if string is palindrome. Print Yes if palindrome else No.

challenges.title: Copy String
challenges.description: Read S and print a copy of S (simply print S).

challenges.title: Concatenate Strings
challenges.description: Read S1 and S2 and print S1S2 (no space between).

challenges.title: First Occurrence
challenges.description: Print the index of first occurrence of character X in string S. If not found print -1.
challenges.inputDescription: S then X on new line.

challenges.title: Word Count
challenges.description: Count and print number of words in a sentence. Words separated by spaces.
examples:
Input:
Hello world from Java
Output:
4

challenges.title: Character Frequency a–z
challenges.description: Print frequency of each lowercase letter a–z. Output 26 lines in format: a:x, b:x, c:x … z:x
examples:
Input:
apple
Output:
a:1
b:0
c:0
...
z:0 (with correct counts)
